explains: adj. （女子）丰满性感的；奢侈淫逸的，满足感官的；风骚的

sentences.en: My starving soul nearly screamed with each voluptuous bite of silky roasted vegetables and chewy crust.
sentences.cn: 每次奢侈地咬一口柔滑的烤蔬菜和耐嚼的面包皮，我饥饿的灵魂都几乎尖叫。

sentences.en: A beautiful, voluptuous woman goes to a gynecologist.
sentences.cn: 一个妖艳的美吕去看妇科医生。

sentences.en: In two months I went from a voluptuous 164 1bs. to 134 1bs.
sentences.cn: 在两个月之内，我的体重从164磅减到了134磅。
